<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Start from innermost BBs first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedcollector">SeedCollector</a> SC(&amp;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.getScalarEvolution());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/seedbundle">SeedBundle</a> &amp;Seeds : SC.getStoreSeeds()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ElmBits =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a880037a6ce1e268642581425f4f44c5f">Utils::getNumBits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#ab3b71740aabd9ed0695bae2780f0247d">VecUtils::getElementType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583">Utils::getExpectedType</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DivideBy2 = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Num) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Floor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#afa56faa35b026a814f2fd65fd3016a4d">VecUtils::getFloorPowerOf2</a>(Num);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Floor == Num)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Floor / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Floor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to create the largest vector supported by the target. If it fails</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduce the vector size by half.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SliceElms = std::min(VecRegBits / ElmBits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         Seeds.getNumUnusedBits() / ElmBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">           SliceElms &gt;= 2u; SliceElms = DivideBy2(SliceElms)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seeds.allUsed())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep trying offsets after FirstUnusedElementIdx, until we vectorize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the slice. This could be quite expensive, so we enforce a limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = Seeds.getFirstUnusedElementIdx(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      OE = Seeds.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + 1 &lt; OE; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Seeds are getting used as we vectorize, so skip them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seeds.isUsed(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Seeds.allUsed())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SeedSlice =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">              Seeds.getSlice(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, SliceElms &#42; ElmBits, !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aecce776bde376ee1d65c3d99abf3d175">AllowNonPow2</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SeedSlice.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SeedSlice.size() &gt;= 2 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should have been rejected!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: If vectorization succeeds, run the RegionPassManager on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resulting region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Refactor to remove the unnecessary copy to SeedSliceVals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> SeedSliceVals(SeedSlice.begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             SeedSlice.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Change |= tryVectorize(SeedSliceVals);</span></CodeLine>
